channel.title: Help thieveing exp
channel.description:
okay I need help im makin a thieve place that has alot u can thieve but the only problem is idk how to change the exp rate for 2 things. pickitpocket man and magic stall. [IMG]http://i360.photobucket.com/albums/oo45/owner_sexy/thieve.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i360.photobucket.com/albums/oo45/owner_sexy/magicstall.jpg[/img]
I have looked in alot of places that i thought it might be but im just a beginer coder so I probaly missed somthing.
Somone please help??

item.title: Help thieveing exp
item.dc:creator: @karahan101 karahan101
item.description:
@karahan101 wrote:

if(NPCID == 1){ robPerson("man", 995, 105, 29, 1); }

i did change the 29 but then got that error so i changed it back so thats same

actionInterval = 5000; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); addSkillXP(exp*playerLevel[17], 17); addItem(item, amount); setAnimation(881); sM("You pickpocket the "+NPCNAME+"."); }

I changed all that back too. I think this was in here when i first got the source cuz its only when somone levels in thieving you can get exp and be fine but then u lvl and BOOM client error and crash

Read full topic

item.title: Help thieveing exp
item.dc:creator: @karahan101 karahan101
item.description:
@karahan101 wrote:

okay i have this robperson void:

public void robPerson(String NPCNAME, int item, int amount, int exp, int req) { if(playerLevel[17] < req){ sM("You need at least "+req+" thieving to thieve this "+NPCNAME+"."); return; }

and also i figured out when i put everything back its when you level in thieving your client gets that error and crashes. wtf does that mean??

Read full topic

item.title: Help thieveing exp
item.dc:creator: @raped_by_who raped by who
item.description:
@raped_by_who wrote:

I believe you’re still kinda mis-reading it a bit… The only way to change the exp would be to
change

addSkillXP(exp*playerLevel[17], 17);

to…

addSkillXP(1000*playerLevel[17], 17);

And that would change the Exp for every NPC he pickpocketed.

He’s gonna need to use the robPerson method.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 06, 2009, 06:56:25 pm[/size][hr]++ 1) Who are you to come out of nowhere thinking you know everything

I know enough to answer every question on these forums lul >.>

Read full topic

item.title: Help thieveing exp
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“raped by who, post:11, topic:293382”]Dude, read my post?
Kuchiki didnt read the code clearly, or just doesnt understand it.

} actionInterval = 5000; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); addSkillXP(exp*playerLevel[17], 17); addItem(item, amount); setAnimation(881); sM("You pickpocket the "+NPCNAME+"."); }

That code isnt JUST for the man, its a base method for ALL of the npc’s.

addSkillXP(exp*playerLevel[17], 17};
makes it add the amount of exp the npc gives times there thieving level, to the players current thieving. :D[/quote]

  1. Who are you to randomly come out of the blue and pretend to know everything?

  2. Yes, sorry. I did misread it a little. Was in a rush. Just look for exp or try taking it out of the equation.

Or, you could use his way. But you would need to make a method for robPerson.

Read full topic

We encourage independent thought, meaning you must help yourselves before requesting help. Failure to provide some sort of prior knowledge or work to the problem will result in a lock of the topic. This is final.

item.title: Help thieveing exp
item.dc:creator: @raped_by_who raped by who
item.description:
@raped_by_who wrote:

Dude, read my post?
Kuchiki didnt read the code clearly, or just doesnt understand it.

} actionInterval = 5000; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); addSkillXP(exp*playerLevel[17], 17); addItem(item, amount); setAnimation(881); sM("You pickpocket the "+NPCNAME+"."); }

That code isnt JUST for the man, its a base method for ALL of the npc’s.

addSkillXP(exp*playerLevel[17], 17};
makes it add the amount of exp the npc gives times there thieving level, to the players current thieving.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @karahan101 karahan101
item.description:
@karahan101 wrote:

[quote=“Kuchiki, post:8, topic:293382”]Look for exp, since it appears to be exp TIMES playerLevel[17], 17

Or just change the second 17.[/quote]

Well when i changed the second 17 and tried to pickpocket it crashed the server lol and the exp now is 29 so what exactly would i search?

That code isnt JUST for the man, its a base method for ALL of the npc’s.

addSkillXP(exp*playerLevel[17], 17};
makes it add the amount of exp the npc gives times there thieving level, to the players current thieving.

item.title: Help thieveing exp
item.dc:creator: @raped_by_who raped by who
item.description:
@raped_by_who wrote:

[quote=“karahan101, post:5, topic:293382”]//magic stall if(objectID == 4877){ if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction > actionInterval){ actionInterval = 1000; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); addItem(Item.stallreward(), 100); setAnimation(881); }

thats all i got for the magic stall I dont see where u edit the exp??

and also

} actionInterval = 5000; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); addSkillXP(exp*playerLevel[17], 17); addItem(item, amount); setAnimation(881); sM("You pickpocket the "+NPCNAME+"."); }

Thats what i got with ur last suggestion.
I see the exp but 17 and all when u pickpocket the man it gives u 29xp so idk? :[/quote]

Look closer.
[17] isnt the XP rate, its the skill ID for thieving

Read full topic
